name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Poshmark Mega Filter - Declutter the search

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Hide search listings by keyword, sellers, brands, likes and more.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Improve the Poshmark search results. Filter and hide listings by keywords, sellers, brands, likes and more. 

I notice there has been more irrelevant results on Poshmark popping up. Having more control on the search results improve the shopping experience. It helps find what you want faster. There are some features that Poshmark doesn't currently have that will help you.


What the Poshmark chrome extension tool can do?
- Hide listing if it contains a list of keywords
- Hide brands
- Hide sellers
- Hide listing with more or less than a number of Likes
- Hide listing with more or less than a number of Comments
- Hide listing if the title has more or less than a number of words
- Hide listings not for sale
- Hide already sold listings
- Hide sold out listings
- You can have the filtered listing fade out or completely hide it.


Currently works for
- Search results
- Sellers closet results


Instructions:
- Load the Poshmark Mega Filter extension
- Turn on any of the filters you want
- Reload the page to see the changes

Changelog:
1.0.1 Updated the filter because Poshmark updated their site structure.


Nothing is logged or tracked so we don't know if it stops working . Message me and I'll get it fixed. Also feel free to message me on what you want on the filter.
